# API Reference for cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps

   ArtifactoryBackendProps <a name="ArtifactoryBackendProps" id="cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps"></a>
  
  Stores the state as an artifact in a given repository in Artifactory.
  
  Generic HTTP repositories are supported, and state from different configurations
  may be kept at different subpaths within the repository.
  
  Note: The URL must include the path to the Artifactory installation.
  It will likely end in /artifactory.
  
  This backend does not support state locking.
  
  Read more about this backend in the Terraform docs:
  https://www.terraform.io/language/settings/backends/artifactory
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```java
  import com.hashicorp.cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps;
  
  ArtifactoryBackendProps.builder()
      .password(java.lang.String)
      .repo(java.lang.String)
      .subpath(java.lang.String)
      .url(java.lang.String)
      .username(java.lang.String)
      .build();
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.password">password</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) - The password. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.repo">repo</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) - The repository name. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.subpath">subpath</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) - Path within the repository. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.url">url</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) - The URL. |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.username">username</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | (Required) - The username. |

  ## `url`<sup>Required</sup> <a name="url" id="cdktf.ArtifactoryBackendProps.property.url"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getUrl();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  
  (Required) - The URL.
  
  Note that this is the base url to artifactory not the full repo and subpath.
